### Hello

I am a neuroscientist, digital illustrator, sketch artist, and a Postdoctoral fellow at Italian Institute of Technology in the Brain Disease and Development Department. I study neurodevelopmental disorder, Down syndrome with a focus on multi-omics analysis and human induced pluripotent stem cells.
